path.name: Pine Forest
path.desc: You open your eyes and wake up in a pine forest, the dim light of the sun waving through the top of the pine trees is making you dizzy, you decide to raise and find a way out.

path.name: Clearing
path.desc: As you walk toward the light, you find a clearing and begin to hear some noise around you.

path.name: Muddy road
path.desc: A road probably leading to a village or a farm, you notice a few bones lying on the ground, it cannot be a good sign...

path.name: Abandonned market place
path.desc: You finally found a small village, but it seems abandonned...

path.name: Old bakery
path.desc: It is a small bakery, looks like the door is locked.

path.name: Manor
path.desc: It is a manor, the owner must have been very rich. The door is locked.

path.name: Church
path.desc: A church, might not be the best idea to get there now...

path.name: Tavern
path.desc: A tavern, seems like the sound comes from there.

path.name: Inside the tavern
path.desc: It is really dark in here, if only you could grab something to make it lighter...
